message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $105 for it. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $135.
Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but $135 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $120.  Let's see if we can find some common ground.
